title: North America Servers Down?
body: Trying t0 play some League than all of a sudden "unavailable" for the (North America) server. Just tried EU server and is working fine. Was just trying to see if anyone else is getting this same problem?

replies.body: It looks like there were a few hiccups with the servers last night, but I believe those are all ironed out as of right now! Hit me back up if you're still having problems getting logged in.
